str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From para and the middle voice of aiteo; to beg off, i.e. Deprecate, decline, shun.
Feminine of a presumed derivative apparently from the base of chasma through the idea of deficiency; a widow, literally or figuratively.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To grow wanton towards. From kata and streniao; to become voluptuous against.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.
